org.solarus_games.solarus.Launcher.desktop CC0-1.0 GPL-3.0 Solarus Launcher Browse and play your Solarus quest collection.
Solarus Launcher is a desktop GUI frontend that allows to browse and play to Solarus quests, which are video games made with the Solarus game engine.
https://www.solarus-games.org/data/en/entities/article/old/2016/07/images/solarus-launcher.png
